column1: You know, the one where you sit there and lie through your teeth about spending every waking hour flossing and probing and massaging and never go out of an evening without your single - headed brush, and the Aussie hygienist who looks like Brooke Shields on a good day takes one prod at your gum and it spouts blood like Moby Dick on a bad day and the game's up there and then.
